subject: Re: Thank you for your recent loan request, we are accepting your refinance loan request
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire TONIGHT):
$239,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this simplified form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://icvbmitecat.com/
